name: $linkId
desc: Returns: The item from the Questionnaire that corresponds to this item in the QuestionnaireResponse resource.

name: $definition
desc: Returns: A reference to an [ElementDefinition](elementdefinition.html) that provides the details for the item.

name: $text
desc: Returns: Text that is displayed above the contents of the group or as the text of the question being answered.

name: $subject
desc: Returns: More specific subject this section's answers are about, details the subject given in QuestionnaireResponse.

name: $answer
desc: Returns: The respondent's answer(s) to the question.
